name: "All My Children"-- Michael Cambias Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Michael on trial for raping?
questions.explanation:
Bianca.

	Michael raped Bianca.  He was not convicted of it however.  This sent the whole town on a rampage and caused someone to murder him.

questions.text: Which of the following companies was searching for a male spokesman for their business?
questions.explanation:
Fusion.

	Greenlee, Mia, Simone, and Kendall, the women of Fusion, were in search of a hot new model to help put their company on the map.

questions.text: Which of the following people has NOT been sited as a suspect in Michael Cambias' death?
questions.explanation:
Opal.

	Opal definitely could not be listed as a suspect, because the night of his murder she was in jail for soliciting the purchase of drugs.  It was Opal and to plant drugs in Michael's house so that he could be arrested.  It backfired on her.

questions.text: Who was the first person to find Michael Cambias' body in the abandoned freezer?
questions.explanation:
Ryan.

	Ryan found him and he then called Edmund to come to see what he had found.  Ryan then vanished and Edmund called it in that he was the first one to find him.

questions.text: What is the name of the magazine that Brooke owns and writes for?
questions.explanation:
Tempo.

	"Tempo" the magazine has been around "AMC" since the 1980s.

questions.text: What item did Erica lose in Michael Cambias' apartment?
questions.explanation:
Her daily planner.

	David and Erica went to Michael's and she accidentally dropped the planner.  She frantically had to get it back because it had her initials on it.

questions.text: Which state is Pine Valley supposed to be set in?
questions.explanation:
Pennsylvania.

	It is a fictitious town that is supposed to be not far from New York City.

questions.text: When J.R. came back to town he had just gotten married.  What is the name of his new wife?
questions.explanation:
Babe.

	Yes, it is actually Babe.  Babe is short for Airabella.

questions.text: What famous gambling city did Kendall and Michael supposedly get married in?
questions.explanation:
Las Vegas.

	Kendall actually did not marry Michael.  She went to Las Vegas and made all of the arrangement so that it looked like she married him before he died.  We will have to wait and see what part she actually played in his death.

questions.text: Erica was the first person that Bianca told that she decided to keep her baby.
questions.explanation:
False.

	She doesn't want to tell her mother at all that she has decided to keep Michael Cambias' baby.  David, Maggie, and Kendall are among the very few that know she did not get an abortion, but decided to keep the baby.
